The serological dataset mordor-ab-analysis-public.csv, together with documentation was available from:

Arnold, Benjamin; Arzika, Ahmed; Maliki, Ramatou et al. (2021).
Multiplex IgG antibody response and malaria parasitemia among children ages 1-59 months in the MORDOR Niger trial, 2015-2018 [Dataset].
Dryad.
https://doi.org/10.7272/Q6VX0DSD

haiti-enterics-public.csv was available from:
https://doi.org/10.17605/OSF.IO/7FRW2
